department: Enterprise IT Procurement Directorate (EITP) at Shared Services Canada (SSC)
short_summary: Canada is seeking the services of contract drafters
description: The Cloud Services (CS) team is looking for an agile RFP contract drafter to continue and expand the existing cloud procurement ecosystem, supporting procurement services for various government departments, and active collaboration with stakeholders to formulate the description of requirements in both English and French. The selected respondent will provide draft RFP contracts (in both English and French) to respond to cloud procurement requiremenets untill 2026 and potential multi-year contract extension until 2028. Regional office locations vary between Toronto and Ottawa depending on project appointements (CS employment has 6 presence-re locations in Canada).

full_summary:
# Contract Drafter - Agile Procurement 
## Tender Details

This is a request for proposal (RFP) for the provision of contract drafter services for Agile Procurement. The solicitation is open to micro and small businesses, including indigenous businesses.

### Contract Details

The Cloud Services (CS) procurement team at Shared Services Canada is seeking the services of a contract drafter to provide agile procurement contract drafting services. The contract will be for an indefinite period, with the expected start date and end date TBD.

#### Scope of Work

The contract drafter will be responsible for drafting contracts for cloud services in a manner that is consistent with the Government of Canada's procurement policies and procedures. The contracts will be for the provision of cloud services to government departments and agencies.

#### Key Requirements

* Contract drafting expertise in the context of public procurement, agile procurement, and IT procurement
* Experience in facilitating with vendors and internal stakeholders
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team
* Strong communication and writing skills

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The contract drafter must meet the minimum requirements outlined in the RFP.

#### Tender Process

The tender process will involve the submission of a proposal, which will be evaluated based on the evaluation criteria outlined above. The tender documents are available on the Canada's digital marketplace.

#### Attachments

The following attachments are available:

* Tender package (English and French)
* Bid solicitation form (BSF)
* Financial bid form
* Resulting contract (ICB)

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact James Morgan at:

* Phone: (604) 715-7515
* Email: [James.Morgan@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:James.Morgan@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Address: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, ON K2P2N1

Closing Date: June 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

Note: This is a government of Canada tender announcement. Please ensure that you have read and understood the terms and conditions of the tender before submitting your proposal. 

Let me know if you'd like to add anything! 
Also, here are the UNSPSC classification codes in case you need them for your work.

*80100000 Management advisory services
*80101500 Business and corporate management consultation services
*80160000 Business administration services
*80161500 Management support services
